pkgmetadata.longdescription: 食用前准备the preparation before use the module1.下载并安装python及pip1.download and install python and pip2.(1).Win+R and input "cmd"2.(2).Enter3.input "pip install lichenggong" and Enter3.wait for a little mins4.create new file "anything.py"5.(1).input "import lichenggong" and Enter in the file5.(2).input "lichenggong.start()" and Enter in the file6.double-click the filepython download by www.python.org/download
